tool_description: This API generates fake data for you to use while e.g. developing your e-commerce website.
name: E-Commerce Mock Data
title: E-Commerce Mock Data

api_list.name: Conditions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://e-commerce-mock-data.p.rapidapi.com/conditions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "e-commerce-mock-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
